archimate:Requirement.name: PA.1.2.10b: b) using approved access control mechanisms (e.g. passwords/passphrases, tokens or biometrics) to restrict access to a limited number of authorised users and administrators
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
